meanings: [명사] emergency, urgency, [형용사] urgent, pressing, burning, (formal) exigent

examples.korean: Paramedics treated the injured at the roadside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 긴급 의료원들이 부상자들을 길가에서 치료했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Our aim is immediacy of response to emergency calls. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 목표는 긴급 호출에 신속하게 반응하는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our aim is immediacy of response to emergency calls. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The theatre faces closure unless it gets an urgent cash injection. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 극장은 긴급 자금을 투입받지 못하면 폐쇄될 형편이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The theatre faces closure unless it gets an urgent cash injection. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A helicopter was scrambled to help rescue three young climbers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 젊은 등반가 세 명의 구조를 돕기 위해 헬리콥터 한 대를 긴급 이륙시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A helicopter was scrambled to help rescue three young climbers. Add to Wordbook
